Meutya Hafid : Menhan Prabowo Subianto Dinantikan Publik
07 Nov 2019, 16:26 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Meutya Hafid : Menhan Prabowo Subianto Dinantikan Publik

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Komisi I DPR RI Meutya Hafid mengutarakan, Rapat Kerja Komisi I DPR RI dengan Kementerian Pertahanan (Kemhan) akan berlangsung Senin, 11 November 2019 mendatang. Dan itu menurut Meutya adalah Raker perdana antara keduanya.Â Bahkan Menhan Prabowo Subianto sudah mengkonfirmasi kehadiran tepat di saat Sekretariat Komisi I melayangkan surat pemanggilan Raker. Bakal mendampingi Prabowo nantinya adalah seluruh jajaran Kemhan, termasuk Wakil Menhan Wahyu Sakti Trenggono."Komisi I DPR memanggil Menhan Prabowo Subianto, Senin, 11 November 2019, pukul 10.00 WIB, melalui komunikasi antara Sekretariat Komisi I dan Kemhan. Pak Prabowo menyatakan hadir didampingi Wamen," kata Meutya Hafid kepada wartawan melalui keterangan resmi yang diterima RRI di Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dalam Raker perdana nanti, Komisi I dan Kemhan akan membahas soal kebijakan Kemhan dan strategi pertahanan negara yang akan disampaikan langsung oleh Menhan Prabowo Subianto."Hal hal yang terkait kebijakan umum Kemhan dapat disampaikan dalam rapat terbuka. Namun, yang terkait strategi dan rahasia negara tentu disampaikan secara tertutup," ujarnya.Politisi Partai Golkar itu juga optimis bahwa Raker perdana dengan Kemhan bakal berjalan lancar, karena publik memang menantikan kehadiran Prabowo Subianto sebagai Menhan di DPR."Sebagai pimpinan Komisi I DPR RI, saya yakin kami dengan Pak Prabowo Subianto dapat menjalankan kemitraan yang baik dan saling menghormati," pungkasnya. (Sumber : Jorike Fitri/RRI-PRO3)

Meutya Hafid: Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto Is Publicly Awaited
Nov 7 2019, 16:26 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Meutya Hafid: Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto Is Publicly Awaited

KBRN, Jakarta: Chairperson of the House of Representatives Commission I Meutya Hafid expressed, the Work Meeting of the House of Representatives Commission I with the Ministry of Defense (Kemhan) will take place on Monday, 11 November 2019. And according to Meutya is the inaugural meeting between the two. Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto has even confirmed his presence right when the Secretariat of Commission I sent a letter calling the working meeting. Will accompany Prabowo later is the entire range of Ministry of Defense, including Deputy Minister of Defense Wahyu Sakti Trenggono. "Commission I of the DPR summoned Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto, Monday, November 11, 2019, at 10:00 WIB, through communication between the Secretariat of Commission I and the Ministry of Defense. "Meutya Hafid told reporters through an official statement received by RRI in Jakarta on Thursday (11/07/2019). In the inaugural meeting, Commission I and the Ministry of Defense will discuss the matter of the Ministry of Defense and the national defense strategy which will be delivered directly by Defense Minister Prabowo. "Matters related to the general policy of the Ministry of Defense can be conveyed in an open meeting. However, related to the strategy and state secrets of the course conveyed in private," he said. looking forward to Prabowo Subianto's presence as Minister of Defense in the DPR. "As the leader of Commission I of the DPR RI, I am sure we are with Pak Prabowo Subianto can run a good partnership and respect each other, "he concluded. (Source: Jorike Fitri / RRI-PRO3)
